event_name: Demystifying Blockchain Privacy: Zama Meetup and Afterwork
description:
The workshop: 6pm-7:30pm ü§ì‚õì

‚ÄãCurrent blockchain transparency is an issue when on-chain data needs to be confidential.

‚ÄãZama‚Äôs fhEVM, the only protocol based on fully homomorphic encryption (FHE) enabling both transparency and confidentiality, allows computing on the encrypted data on-chain.

Following the release of the Zama's fhEVM white paper https://github.com/zama-ai/fhevm/blob/main/fhevm-whitepaper.pdf, Morten Dahl, Zama's Senior Blockchain Director, will dive into how FHE can be integrated directly into the EVM.

He will also explain how it is enabling developers to write private smart contracts in Solidity, and will tell more about how FHE can contribute to blockchain privacy in comparison to other existing technologies.

‚ÄãThe after workshop: 7:30pm-11pm üçïüç∫

‚ÄãRight after the meetup the venue will be transformed into a lounge and you‚Äôll be invited to enjoy drinks, food and music with the Zama team. Join us and let‚Äôs discuss everything blockchain, privacy and homomorphic encryption.

We hope you are excited, because we are!
